creator: Insite Group Limited
descriptionHtml:
Insite Teams is one handy app that brings the right people and the right tools together, to help you work quicker and smarter. The platform facilitates all of your project auditing needs and allows you to work on these with your coworkers and project teams, across an array of devices including on the web.

The platform helps you improve your snagging efficiency, project quality control, progress reporting and site safety. Create lists and collaborate with your project team. Assign tasks and track their progress. Generate reports in both PDF and Excel format for bulletproof records.

Real time information ensures that everyone on the project is on the same page when it comes to the latest snags and safety issues. Use Insite for snagging, auditing safety, making condition surveys and more.

An app for any project, big or small. Whether you work on a construction site, in a production environment or in any industry where you regularly carry out audits, Insite Teams is a handy tool that’s with you every step of the process.

We’ve designed Insite to help teams of any size to:
- Get on top of projects
- Streamline processes
- Speed up collaboration
- Grow with your business


This is a beta release of Insite Teams ahead of the full launch next year, meaning you can use it now completely for free!

To find out more about the Insite Teams launch, as well as which pricing plans will be available, get in touch with us via the contact form at https://www.insiteapp.co.uk/?support

If you are using Insite Teams Beta and are looking for help and FAQs then head over to our Help Centre at https://insiteapp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb or get in touch via the contact form as above.
descriptionShort: The collaboration hub for all of your snagging & auditing needs

title: Insite Teams

creator: Insite Group Limited
descriptionHtml:
About Insite Teams

Insite Teams is a collaborative auditing, snagging & inspection management software solution. Insite connects your whole team providing them with efficient and real-time status updates on your reports whilst they are in the field and in the office.

The ability to communicate with your team makes it easier to work together by understanding a single source of truth. Insite Teams gives each team member access to everything they need to get the job done as efficiently as possible.

With Insite Teams you can manage projects from any device, allowing you to work quicker, smarter, and better. The easy-to-use interface brings a host of features that will speed up your audits and inspections.

Features

Inspections & snagging – easily carry out inspections & audits, with the ability to use the software on any device you can take and annotate photos on the go and manage the issues from your desktop later. Add comments, assign to your colleagues and set a deadline to track ongoing issues. You can also create status requests and set item priorities.

Collaboration – set up projects with your team members and standardise your processes. Receive live notifications for every action taken on a project, with a detailed record on each item making sure your inspections are completed effectively.

Reports - automatically generate and share PDF or XLSX reports in custom formats from phone, tablet or desktop making it easy for you to distribute them to your colleagues and clients.

Templates - streamline the auditing & snagging process by templating your regular inspections. Create custom status options for each template enhancing the versatility of the platform allowing you to employ it for more of your processes.

Use cases include

Snagging

- Log snags in seconds
- Instantly create outstanding works lists
- Your assignees will be notified

Health & Safety

- Daily/weekly inspections
- Log & assign issues on the go
- Sign off your reports when they are closed out.

Quality control

- Template your QA documents to speed up your checks.

Commercial

- Create progress reports and use them against valuations.
- Track clear up notices
- Automatic history logging keeps your records in check.

“Insite teams is a very easy, simple and effective piece of software that benefits me whilst undertaking my day-to-day role on site. Many parts of my role are made easier by using the software, this product helps me undertake reports on site quickly and efficiently, by constructing reports whilst on the move, it eliminates the need for paperwork and reduces time.”

Daniel Booth - Insite Teams user

What sets Insite apart?

Insite Teams has been designed with one thing in mind — efficiency. Our sophisticated software allows you to add multiple items at once and transfer information between items, such as their location, as you create them.

Chances are, you’re working on multiple projects at once. With the help of Insite, you can keep your lists arranged within projects to keep them organised and accessible. Easily add essential info including an image, the client’s and architect’s names and your job’s location. Create as many lists as you like to store within each project.

Track your items as Incomplete, In Progress or Complete with our colour coded status system. When an incomplete item is past its due date, you’ll be reminded that it’s overdue. Use the status' to filter your views and determine which items you export to your reports.

Insite's PDF reports have professional cover pages that can include your details and a company logo. Store all your reports within the app and distribute them at the press of a button either as you complete your list, or at any later time.

You can even convert your lists into an Excel spreadsheet that can be transferred to your desktop – helpful if you want to share your lists with your co-workers and edit them between yourselves.
descriptionShort: The collaboration hub for all of your snagging & auditing needs

Added:

- Desktop notifications
- Email notifications
- Notifications by project
- Item sort by priority high to low
- Default sort order on reports
- Default summary text on reports
- Toggle graphs on reports

Fixed:

- Saving edited images on desktop sometimes failed
- Multi-edit status of an item

With Insite Teams you can manage projects from any device, allowing you to work quicker, smarter, and better. The easy-to-use interface brings a host of features that will speed up your audits and inspections.

Features

Inspections & snagging – easily carry out inspections & audits, with the ability to use the software on any device you can take and annotate photos on the go and manage the issues from your desktop later. Add comments, assign to your colleagues and set a deadline to track ongoing issues. You can also create status requests and set item priorities.

Collaboration – set up projects with your team members and standardise your processes. Receive live notifications for every action taken on a project, with a detailed record on each item making sure your inspections are completed effectively.

Reports - automatically generate and share PDF or XLSX reports in custom formats from phone, tablet or desktop making it easy for you to distribute them to your colleagues and clients.

Templates - streamline the auditing & snagging process by templating your regular inspections. Create custom status options for each template enhancing the versatility of the platform allowing you to employ it for more of your processes.

Use cases include

Snagging

- Log snags in seconds
- Instantly create outstanding works lists
- Your assignees will be notified

Health & Safety

- Daily/weekly inspections
- Log & assign issues on the go
- Sign off your reports when they are closed out.

Quality control

- Template your QA documents to speed up your checks.

Commercial

- Create progress reports and use them against valuations.
- Track clear up notices
- Automatic history logging keeps your records in check.

“Insite teams is a very easy, simple and effective piece of software that benefits me whilst undertaking my day-to-day role on site. Many parts of my role are made easier by using the software, this product helps me undertake reports on site quickly and efficiently, by constructing reports whilst on the move, it eliminates the need for paperwork and reduces time.”

Daniel Booth - Insite Teams user

What sets Insite apart?

Insite Teams has been designed with one thing in mind — efficiency. Our sophisticated software allows you to add multiple items at once and transfer information between items, such as their location, as you create them.

Chances are, you’re working on multiple projects at once. With the help of Insite, you can keep your lists arranged within projects to keep them organised and accessible. Easily add essential info including an image, the client’s and architect’s names and your job’s location. Create as many lists as you like to store within each project.

Track your items as Incomplete, In Progress or Complete with our colour coded status system. When an incomplete item is past its due date, you’ll be reminded that it’s overdue. Use the status' to filter your views and determine which items you export to your reports.

Insite's PDF reports have professional cover pages that can include your details and a company logo. Store all your reports within the app and distribute them at the press of a button either as you complete your list, or at any later time.

You can even convert your lists into an Excel spreadsheet that can be transferred to your desktop – helpful if you want to share your lists with your co-workers and edit them between yourselves.
descriptionShort: The collaboration hub for all of your snagging & auditing needs

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We've added support for working offline which allows you to audit & snag wherever you are, whether you're in the basement or out in the field. Enable 'Offline upload' in the Image Settings to give our new beta feature a try.

Track your items as Incomplete, In Progress or Complete with our colour coded status system. When an incomplete item is past its due date, you’ll be reminded that it’s overdue. Use the status' to filter your views and determine which items you export to your reports.

Insite's PDF reports have professional cover pages that can include your details and a company logo. Store all your reports within the app and distribute them at the press of a button either as you complete your list, or at any later time.

You can even convert your lists into an Excel spreadsheet that can be transferred to your desktop – helpful if you want to share your lists with your co-workers and edit them between yourselves.
descriptionShort: The collaboration hub for all of your snagging & auditing needs

Many parts of my role are made easier by using the software, this product helps me undertake reports on site quickly and efficiently, by constructing reports whilst on the move, it eliminates the need for paperwork and reduces time.”

Daniel Booth - Insite Teams user

What sets Insite apart?

Insite Teams has been designed with one thing in mind — efficiency. Our sophisticated software allows you to add multiple items at once and transfer information between items, such as their location, as you create them.

Chances are, you’re working on multiple projects at once. With the help of Insite, you can keep your lists arranged within projects to keep them organised and accessible. Easily add essential info including an image, the client’s and architect’s names and your job’s location. Create as many lists as you like to store within each project.

Track your items as Incomplete, In Progress or Complete with our colour coded status system. When an incomplete item is past its due date, you’ll be reminded that it’s overdue. Use the status' to filter your views and determine which items you export to your reports.

Insite's PDF reports have professional cover pages that can include your details and a company logo. Store all your reports within the app and distribute them at the press of a button either as you complete your list, or at any later time.

You can even convert your lists into an Excel spreadsheet that can be transferred to your desktop – helpful if you want to share your lists with your co-workers and edit them between yourselves.
descriptionShort: The collaboration hub for all of your snagging & auditing needs

title: Insite Teams

creator: Insite Group Limited
descriptionHtml:
About Insite Teams

Insite Teams is a collaborative auditing, snagging & inspection management software solution. Insite connects your whole team providing them with efficient and real-time status updates on your reports whilst they are in the field and in the office.

The ability to communicate with your team makes it easier to work together by understanding a single source of truth. Insite Teams gives each team member access to everything they need to get the job done as efficiently as possible.

With Insite Teams you can manage projects from any device, allowing you to work quicker, smarter, and better. The easy-to-use interface brings a host of features that will speed up your audits and inspections.

Features

Inspections & snagging – easily carry out inspections & audits, with the ability to use the software on any device you can take and annotate photos on the go and manage the issues from your desktop later. Add comments, assign to your colleagues and set a deadline to track ongoing issues. You can also create status requests and set item priorities.

Collaboration – set up projects with your team members and standardise your processes. Receive live notifications for every action taken on a project, with a detailed record on each item making sure your inspections are completed effectively.

Reports - automatically generate and share PDF or XLSX reports in custom formats from phone, tablet or desktop making it easy for you to distribute them to your colleagues and clients.

Templates - streamline the auditing & snagging process by templating your regular inspections. Create custom status options for each template enhancing the versatility of the platform allowing you to employ it for more of your processes.

Use cases include

Snagging

- Log snags in seconds
- Instantly create outstanding works lists
- Your assignees will be notified

Health & Safety

- Daily/weekly inspections
- Log & assign issues on the go
- Sign off your reports when they are closed out.

Quality control

- Template your QA documents to speed up your checks.

Commercial

- Create progress reports and use them against valuations.
- Track clear up notices
- Automatic history logging keeps your records in check.

Templates - streamline the auditing & snagging process by templating your regular inspections. Create custom status options for each template enhancing the versatility of the platform allowing you to employ it for more of your processes.

Use cases include

Snagging

- Log snags in seconds
- Instantly create outstanding works lists
- Your assignees will be notified

Health & Safety

- Daily/weekly inspections
- Log & assign issues on the go
- Sign off your reports when they are closed out.

Quality control

- Template your QA documents to speed up your checks.

Commercial

- Create progress reports and use them against valuations.
- Track clear up notices
- Automatic history logging keeps your records in check.

“Insite teams is a very easy, simple and effective piece of software that benefits me whilst undertaking my day-to-day role on site. Many parts of my role are made easier by using the software, this product helps me undertake reports on site quickly and efficiently, by constructing reports whilst on the move, it eliminates the need for paperwork and reduces time.”

Daniel Booth - Insite Teams user

What sets Insite apart?

Insite Teams has been designed with one thing in mind — efficiency. Our sophisticated software allows you to add multiple items at once and transfer information between items, such as their location, as you create them.

Chances are, you’re working on multiple projects at once. With the help of Insite, you can keep your lists arranged within projects to keep them organised and accessible. Easily add essential info including an image, the client’s and architect’s names and your job’s location. Create as many lists as you like to store within each project.

Track your items as Incomplete, In Progress or Complete with our colour coded status system. When an incomplete item is past its due date, you’ll be reminded that it’s overdue. Use the status' to filter your views and determine which items you export to your reports.

Insite's PDF reports have professional cover pages that can include your details and a company logo. Store all your reports within the app and distribute them at the press of a button either as you complete your list, or at any later time.

You can even convert your lists into an Excel spreadsheet that can be transferred to your desktop – helpful if you want to share your lists with your co-workers and edit them between yourselves.
descriptionShort: The collaboration hub for all of your snagging & auditing needs

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New
- Improved image editor with additional annotation tools
- Improved notification messages and additional notification types
- Option to regenerate a report with the same filters and summary text
- Location drawing pins now display the item status

Fixed
- Deeplinking into the app when scanning QR codes on Android
- Due date picker now supports up to 12 months in the past
- General bug fixes and performance improvements

With Insite Teams you can manage projects from any device, allowing you to work quicker, smarter, and better. The easy-to-use interface brings a host of features that will speed up your audits and inspections.

Features

Inspections & snagging – easily carry out inspections & audits, with the ability to use the software on any device you can take and annotate photos on the go and manage the issues from your desktop later. Add comments, assign to your colleagues and set a deadline to track ongoing issues. You can also create status requests and set item priorities.

Collaboration – set up projects with your team members and standardise your processes. Receive live notifications for every action taken on a project, with a detailed record on each item making sure your inspections are completed effectively.

Reports - automatically generate and share PDF or XLSX reports in custom formats from phone, tablet or desktop making it easy for you to distribute them to your colleagues and clients.

Templates - streamline the auditing & snagging process by templating your regular inspections. Create custom status options for each template enhancing the versatility of the platform allowing you to employ it for more of your processes.

Use cases include

Snagging

- Log snags in seconds
- Instantly create outstanding works lists
- Your assignees will be notified

Health & Safety

- Daily/weekly inspections
- Log & assign issues on the go
- Sign off your reports when they are closed out.

Quality control

- Template your QA documents to speed up your checks.

Commercial

- Create progress reports and use them against valuations.
- Track clear up notices
- Automatic history logging keeps your records in check.

“Insite teams is a very easy, simple and effective piece of software that benefits me whilst undertaking my day-to-day role on site. Many parts of my role are made easier by using the software, this product helps me undertake reports on site quickly and efficiently, by constructing reports whilst on the move, it eliminates the need for paperwork and reduces time.”

Daniel Booth - Insite Teams user

What sets Insite apart?

Insite Teams has been designed with one thing in mind — efficiency. Our sophisticated software allows you to add multiple items at once and transfer information between items, such as their location, as you create them.

Chances are, you’re working on multiple projects at once. With the help of Insite, you can keep your lists arranged within projects to keep them organised and accessible. Easily add essential info including an image, the client’s and architect’s names and your job’s location. Create as many lists as you like to store within each project.

Track your items as Incomplete, In Progress or Complete with our colour coded status system. When an incomplete item is past its due date, you’ll be reminded that it’s overdue. Use the status' to filter your views and determine which items you export to your reports.

Insite's PDF reports have professional cover pages that can include your details and a company logo. Store all your reports within the app and distribute them at the press of a button either as you complete your list, or at any later time.

You can even convert your lists into an Excel spreadsheet that can be transferred to your desktop – helpful if you want to share your lists with your co-workers and edit them between yourselves.
descriptionShort: The collaboration hub for all of your snagging & auditing needs

Insite Teams has been designed with one thing in mind — efficiency. Our sophisticated software allows you to add multiple items at once and transfer information between items, such as their location, as you create them.

Chances are, you’re working on multiple projects at once. With the help of Insite, you can keep your lists arranged within projects to keep them organised and accessible. Easily add essential info including an image, the client’s and architect’s names and your job’s location. Create as many lists as you like to store within each project.

Track your items as Incomplete, In Progress or Complete with our colour coded status system. When an incomplete item is past its due date, you’ll be reminded that it’s overdue. Use the status' to filter your views and determine which items you export to your reports.

Insite's PDF reports have professional cover pages that can include your details and a company logo. Store all your reports within the app and distribute them at the press of a button either as you complete your list, or at any later time.

You can even convert your lists into an Excel spreadsheet that can be transferred to your desktop – helpful if you want to share your lists with your co-workers and edit them between yourselves.
descriptionShort: The collaboration hub for all of your snagging & auditing needs

- Ability to customise terminology on a list-by-list basis

Fixed
- On certain screen sizes, the option to take a photo was lost when the device was turned to landscape

title: Insite Teams

creator: Insite Group Limited
descriptionHtml:
About Insite Teams

Insite Teams is a collaborative auditing, snagging & inspection management software solution. Insite connects your whole team providing them with efficient and real-time status updates on your reports whilst they are in the field and in the office.

The ability to communicate with your team makes it easier to work together by understanding a single source of truth. Insite Teams gives each team member access to everything they need to get the job done as efficiently as possible.

With Insite Teams you can manage projects from any device, allowing you to work quicker, smarter, and better. The easy-to-use interface brings a host of features that will speed up your audits and inspections.

Features

Inspections & snagging – easily carry out inspections & audits, with the ability to use the software on any device you can take and annotate photos on the go and manage the issues from your desktop later. Add comments, assign to your colleagues and set a deadline to track ongoing issues. You can also create status requests and set item priorities.

Collaboration – set up projects with your team members and standardise your processes. Receive live notifications for every action taken on a project, with a detailed record on each item making sure your inspections are completed effectively.

Reports - automatically generate and share PDF or XLSX reports in custom formats from phone, tablet or desktop making it easy for you to distribute them to your colleagues and clients.

Templates - streamline the auditing & snagging process by templating your regular inspections. Create custom status options for each template enhancing the versatility of the platform allowing you to employ it for more of your processes.

Use cases include

Snagging

- Log snags in seconds
- Instantly create outstanding works lists
- Your assignees will be notified

Health & Safety

- Daily/weekly inspections
- Log & assign issues on the go
- Sign off your reports when they are closed out.

Quality control

- Template your QA documents to speed up your checks.

Commercial

- Create progress reports and use them against valuations.
- Track clear up notices
- Automatic history logging keeps your records in check.

“Insite teams is a very easy, simple and effective piece of software that benefits me whilst undertaking my day-to-day role on site. Collaboration – set up projects with your team members and standardise your processes. Receive live notifications for every action taken on a project, with a detailed record on each item making sure your inspections are completed effectively.

Reports - automatically generate and share PDF or XLSX reports in custom formats from phone, tablet or desktop making it easy for you to distribute them to your colleagues and clients.

Templates - streamline the auditing & snagging process by templating your regular inspections. Create custom status options for each template enhancing the versatility of the platform allowing you to employ it for more of your processes.

Snagging

- Log snags in seconds
- Instantly create outstanding works lists
- Your assignees will be notified

Health & Safety

- Daily/weekly inspections
- Log & assign issues on the go
- Sign off your reports when they are closed out.

Quality control

- Template your QA documents to speed up your checks.

Commercial

- Create progress reports and use them against valuations.
- Track clear up notices
- Automatic history logging keeps your records in check.

“Insite teams is a very easy, simple and effective piece of software that benefits me whilst undertaking my day-to-day role on site. Daniel Booth - Insite Teams user

What sets Insite apart?

Chances are, you’re working on multiple projects at once. With the help of Insite, you can keep your lists arranged within projects to keep them organised and accessible. Easily add essential info including an image, the client’s and architect’s names and your job’s location. Create as many lists as you like to store within each project.

Track your items as Incomplete, In Progress or Complete with our colour coded status system. When an incomplete item is past its due date, you’ll be reminded that it’s overdue. Use the status' to filter your views and determine which items you export to your reports.

title:
Insite Teams
1.67.0

creator: Insite Group Limited
descriptionHtml:
About Insite
Insite is a powerful app for managing site operations. It is designed to simplify quality control, health & safety (H&S), and project reporting for construction contractors. Insite connects your entire team, offering real-time updates and a single source of truth, whether on-site or in the office.

Tailored for subcontractors, main contractors and design teams, Insite replaces slow, manual workflows with efficient digital tools. From managing inspections and tracking progress to ensuring complete audit trails, Insite helps you oversee every aspect of your project from any device. With Insite, you can resolve issues faster, monitor progress effectively, and keep projects on schedule, ensuring your team stays informed and your jobs are completed on time.


Key processes you can manage with Insite
Site Inspections & H&S Compliance – Replace paper-based health & safety checks with digital forms that allow you to log issues, add photos, and track progress in real-time. Manage weekly or daily safety inspections and ensure everything is signed off digitally, reducing errors and delays.

Progress Tracking & Reporting – Keep your project on track with real-time updates from site to office. Easily generate detailed progress reports, complete with images and feedback, to keep clients and stakeholders informed. Use customisable templates to speed up reporting and ensure accuracy.

Quality Assurance & Audits – Template your QA processes to ensure all quality control checks are consistently carried out. Capture issues on-site, assign tasks to team members, and track their resolution through to completion. Audit trails and real-time updates ensure full transparency for all stakeholders.

Issue Resolution & Task Management – Log issues instantly and assign tasks to team members for swift resolution. Set deadlines, track progress, and ensure tasks are completed on time, improving communication between the site and office. Prioritise and monitor ongoing tasks to keep the project moving forward.

Audit Trails & Compliance – Automatically document every action taken on-site with a full audit trail. Whether you’re conducting inspections, logging safety incidents, or updating progress reports, Insite creates a detailed record, ensuring your projects are always audit-ready and compliant with industry standards.


Testimonial
"Insite is the invaluable connection between our operatives, site staff, and office-based managers, to both monitor the progression of works and also allow for the correct and expeditious payment of wages."

— Steve Ellis, Operations Manager, Trevor Shaw Ltd


Use Cases
Health & Safety Management
Conduct daily or weekly inspections with digital forms.
Assign tasks and track compliance to reduce risks on-site.

Project Progress & Reporting
Create real-time progress reports with customised templates.
Monitor site updates and communicate effectively with clients.

Quality Control & Audits
Streamline quality assurance checks with templated processes.
Keep a clear audit trail for dispute resolution and compliance.


What sets Insite apart?
Insite transforms your site operations by digitising key processes and improving communication between site teams and the office. With full visibility of project progress, seamless task management, and real-time reporting, you can stay in control and ensure your projects are delivered on time and within budget.

From generating professional PDF reports to tracking issues and maintaining compliance, Insite provides all the tools you need to streamline operations and minimise manual work. Manage everything from a single platform, accessible on any device, and simplify your day-to-day processes.

Insite’s platform ensures you have a complete overview of your projects, helping you move faster, work smarter, and deliver better results every time.
descriptionShort: Site operations software for construction contractors

- Option in PDF reports to only have embedded item files and not any item details
- Option to turn off the cover page on the PDF report
- Confirmation prompt when deleting an image from an item
- Option to download plan users as CSV file

Fixed
- PDFs don’t render on older devices
- Users with full access should be able to delete any photos on an item

1.80.0

creator: Insite Group Limited
descriptionHtml:
About Insite
Insite is a powerful app for managing site operations. It is designed to simplify quality control, health & safety (H&S), and project reporting for construction contractors. Insite connects your entire team, offering real-time updates and a single source of truth, whether on-site or in the office.

Tailored for subcontractors, main contractors and design teams, Insite replaces slow, manual workflows with efficient digital tools. From managing inspections and tracking progress to ensuring complete audit trails, Insite helps you oversee every aspect of your project from any device. With Insite, you can resolve issues faster, monitor progress effectively, and keep projects on schedule, ensuring your team stays informed and your jobs are completed on time.


Key processes you can manage with Insite
Site Inspections & H&S Compliance – Replace paper-based health & safety checks with digital forms that allow you to log issues, add photos, and track progress in real-time. Manage weekly or daily safety inspections and ensure everything is signed off digitally, reducing errors and delays.

Progress Tracking & Reporting – Keep your project on track with real-time updates from site to office. Easily generate detailed progress reports, complete with images and feedback, to keep clients and stakeholders informed. Use customisable templates to speed up reporting and ensure accuracy.

Quality Assurance & Audits – Template your QA processes to ensure all quality control checks are consistently carried out. Capture issues on-site, assign tasks to team members, and track their resolution through to completion. Audit trails and real-time updates ensure full transparency for all stakeholders.

Issue Resolution & Task Management – Log issues instantly and assign tasks to team members for swift resolution. Set deadlines, track progress, and ensure tasks are completed on time, improving communication between the site and office. Prioritise and monitor ongoing tasks to keep the project moving forward.

Audit Trails & Compliance – Automatically document every action taken on-site with a full audit trail. Whether you’re conducting inspections, logging safety incidents, or updating progress reports, Insite creates a detailed record, ensuring your projects are always audit-ready and compliant with industry standards.


Testimonial
"Insite is the invaluable connection between our operatives, site staff, and office-based managers, to both monitor the progression of works and also allow for the correct and expeditious payment of wages."

— Steve Ellis, Operations Manager, Trevor Shaw Ltd


Use Cases
Health & Safety Management
Conduct daily or weekly inspections with digital forms.
Assign tasks and track compliance to reduce risks on-site.

Project Progress & Reporting
Create real-time progress reports with customised templates.
Monitor site updates and communicate effectively with clients.

Quality Control & Audits
Streamline quality assurance checks with templated processes.
Keep a clear audit trail for dispute resolution and compliance.


What sets Insite apart?
Insite transforms your site operations by digitising key processes and improving communication between site teams and the office. With full visibility of project progress, seamless task management, and real-time reporting, you can stay in control and ensure your projects are delivered on time and within budget.

From generating professional PDF reports to tracking issues and maintaining compliance, Insite provides all the tools you need to streamline operations and minimise manual work. Manage everything from a single platform, accessible on any device, and simplify your day-to-day processes.

Insite’s platform ensures you have a complete overview of your projects, helping you move faster, work smarter, and deliver better results every time.
